TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A T cell that has been coated with monoclonal antibodies to enhance its ability to kill tumor cells.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "coactivated T cell"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "célula T coactivada"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Célula T que se ha recubierto con anticuerpos monoclonales para mejorar su capacidad de destruir células tumorales.
